definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ezr 7:19 vessel, utensil (Targum [[ן]]([[א]])[[מָ]], Syr. mo0n, so Chr-Pal., Schulth:Lex. 106; OAram. [[מאן]], Ph. [[מנן]]; poss. √ [[אנה]], v. BH II. [[אנה]], cf. Lag:BN 183 Buhl);—pl., vessels of temple at Jerus.: emph. [[מָאנַיׇּא]] Ezr 5:14, Ezr 5:15, Ezr 7:19, Da 5:23; cstr. [[מָאנֵי]] v:Da 5:2, v:Da 5:3, Ezr 6:5.
